alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 4:53AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of moderate to heavy snow showers will affect northwestern York... southern Oxford...central Androscoggin...northwestern Cumberland and Carroll Counties... At 453 AM EST...An area of moderate to heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Canton to near Sandwich...and moving southeast AT 15 MPH. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Conway, Bridgton, Fryeburg, Mechanic Falls, Ossipee, Naples, Turner, Moultonborough, Hiram, Effingham, Waterford, Tamworth, Sandwich, Wolfeboro, Greene, Casco, Bartlett, Harrison, and Madison. This also includes... Mount Chocorua, Pleasant Mountain, Burnt Meadow Mountains, Long Lake, and Kearsarge North . * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll
